WildFly Elytron Parent 1.19.1.Final
  • All Classes
 

Package org.wildfly.security.http.util.sso

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ElytronMessages
    Log messages and exceptions for Elytron.
    ImmutableSingleSignOn
    An immutable view of a cached single sign-on entry.
    SingleSignOn
    A cached single sign-on entry.
    SingleSignOnEntry
    Single sign-on cache entry.
    SingleSignOnManager
    Manages the persistence of a SingleSignOn entry.
    SingleSignOnSession
    Represents a single sign-on session.
    SingleSignOnSessionContext
    Operation context for a SingleSignOnSession.
    SingleSignOnSessionFactory
    A factory for creating SingleSignOnSession instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultSingleSignOn
    SingleSignOn implementation backed by a DefaultSingleSignOnEntry.
    DefaultSingleSignOnEntry
    Cache entry used by DefaultSingleSignOnManager.
    DefaultSingleSignOnManager
    SingleSignOnManager based on a ConcurrentMap of DefaultSingleSignOnEntry instances.
    DefaultSingleSignOnSession
    SingleSignOnSession that delegates its persistence strategy to a SingleSignOnManager.
    DefaultSingleSignOnSessionFactory
    SingleSignOnSessionFactory that delegates the management of single sign-on entries to a SingleSignOnManager.
    DefaultSingleSignOnSessionIdentifierFactory
    Default factory for creating single sign-on identifiers.
    ProgrammaticSingleSignOnCache
    An implementation of IdentityCache to provide SSO for programmatic authentication.
    ProgrammaticSingleSignOnCache.SSOHttpServerRequest
    An implementation of HttpServerRequest which can be used with the {link SingleSignOnSessionFactory}.
    SingleSignOnConfiguration
    The relevent configuration for SingleSignOn.
    SingleSignOnServerMechanismFactory
    A HttpServerAuthenticationMechanismFactory which enables single sign-on to the mechanisms provided by a another http mechanism factory.
    SingleSignOnServerMechanismFactory.SingleSignOnConfiguration Deprecated.
